[[File:HarperCollins - logo.jpg: '''HarperCollins''' is a publishing company which holds the rights for publishing the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] in Europe and Canada ([[Houghton Mifflin]] is the official publisher in the United States). HarperCollins purchased the rights for all books relating to [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
thumb]]: ''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]].<ref>"[http://www.findarticles.com/p/articles/mi_m0EIN/is_2001_Jan_16/ai_69205665 Houghton Mifflin Acquires U.S. Book Rights to New Line Cinema's 'The Lord of the Rings' Movie Trilogy]" (accessed 27 January 2011)</ref>
